attributes.action: Only allow organised firework events or only manufacture of silent fireworks
attributes.additional_details: I live in a small village where there are so many dog and cat owners and there is nothing more distressing than trying to console a terrified pet.  In fact you fact console them at all.
attributes.background: There are so many pet owners in the UK I would love there to be only organised events and not allow for use at homes/back gardens or open land or only manufacture silent fireworks.  They dont have to make a noise

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900
